heading: HR02216
0: RESOLUTION URGING THE HOUSE OF REPRESENTATIVES COMMITTEE ON HUMAN RIGHTS TO CONDUCT AN INQUIRY, IN AID OF LEGISLATION, ON THE SUPPOSED "RED OCTOBER OUSTER PLOT" WHICH MAY BE A PRELUDE TO A MASSIVE CRACKDOWN AGAINST THE OPPOSITION AND RESULT TO WIDESPREAD HUMAN RIGHTS VIOLATIONS
